reference-code-html-content-block-pre-5:
The default background color of the Call to Action is #999999 (gray-dark). In order to have a custom background color for the Call to Action add the following data attribute to the Call to Action container: data-palette-color="".

Choose from the following color options for the value of data-palette-color="":

  • black
  • gray-darkest
  • gray-darker
  • gray-dark
  • gray-mid-dark
  • blue-gray
  • blue-gray-darkest
  • blue-gray-darker
  • blue-gray-dark
  • blue-gray-mid-dark
  • blue-sapphire
  • blue-sapphire-dark
  • blue-sapphire-mid
  • purple
  • purple-dark
  • purple-mid
  • fuscia
  • fuscia-dark
  • fuscia-mid
  • pink
  • pink-dark
  • red
  • red-dark
  • red-mid
  • orange
  • orange-dark
  • orange-mid
  • tan
  • tan-dark
  • green
  • green-darker
  • green-dark
  • green-mid
  • blue-green
  • blue-green-dark
  • blue-green-mid
